TITLE: SQ3R - Survey, Question, Read, Recite, And Review
DEF: A method for improving reading comprehension and retention
TASK: The SQ3R pattern provides a methodical approach to break down complex texts, promoting active involvement and deeper comprehension. Survey, Question, Read, Recite, and Review techniques help to bolster reading comprehension and retention. The challenge lies in ensuring the learners do not just mechanically follow the method but use it to actively engage with the content, requiring educators to offer clear instructions and continuous feedback.
